Control.Text: This is a beta version. There will be bugs so if you found some please send me an error report to an e-mail:
Control.Name: Disclaimer

Control.Text: - Right-click on colorbox will show colorwheel for mixing colors
Control.Name: Tip2

Control.Text: - For changing mount/recall/potion/path skill use right-click
Control.Name: Tip3

Control.Text: - If saving of settings doesn't work use button and let me know (it's a bug)

bAdvanced
